name: gestural

gestural adjective
(MOVEMENT)

(SYMBOLIC ACT)

gestural adjective
(ART)
art
  specialized relating to a style of art that is abstract (= representing the idea of something rather than its physical appearance) and is painted with large, free movements rather than small, controlled movements: From then on his art was characterized by its expansive scale, gestural brushwork, and rich, exuberant palette. There were echoes of postwar and contemporary gestural abstraction.
More examplesFewer examplesThe exhibition invites us to examine the breezy, gestural antics of brushwork rather than asking what the pictures mean.He uses ink and fluorescent paint - sprayed on wildly, splashily gestural.The paintings are positioned to show the progression of gestural abstraction.
